attributes.action: Relax light goods classification for excise duty on vehicles used for social domestic and pleasue only.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Drivers purchasing light goods vehicles based CO2 emissions (doing your bit), are having to pay as much as 5 times what the equivalent car owner pays for the same level of CO2 emission (Ford Fiesta TDCi car & Ford Fiesta TDCi van).
I like many others chose a van for pleasure reasons (two dogs to transport) and looked for a 'greener' mode of transport than my previous Ford Escort van
